column4: I get an error upgrading to 9.10 from 9.04 and I do not know what the next step is to try and fix it.
I have tried to google the error and I find nothing. The error is - Can not mark 'ubuntu-desktop' for upgrade
I do not remember doing anything like that
ubuntu-desktop is actually a number of packages, once you have it installed you don't upgrade it, you upgrade the individual packages instead
